scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary, crowned and seated, holding the Christ Child on her lap. She wears a blue robe adorned with gold patterns. To her right, an angel with green wings plays a pipe. Behind them, a pink curtain is drawn, revealing a grey architectural structure with vertical elements, possibly representing a building or a backdrop. The overall impression is one of regal serenity and divine presence.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with an Angel
